Posts.Content: Hi, I was diagnosed with Colon cancer 2 weeks ago, I am 25 and still can’t believe it! I have been told the cancer is too low down in my bowel to have it removed so they want me to have chemoradiotherapy for 5 weeks and then they will operate and remove it.  I have been reading about the treatment and know it can cause infertility and menopause which is really depressing as all I’ve ever wanted is a family and I do not have any children yet, I’m going to have IVF but I’m worried that the menopause will mean I cannot carry a baby anyway! Just wondering if anyone knows of any other treatments we could try first or of any successful pregnancies after similar treatment. Thanks
